Text: ...Hey, time for me to take watch.

Oh, is it that time already? The guard duty shifts
are so much shorter than usual. They fly by like
nothing.

Hard to call this guard duty with such short and
easy shifts.
(What an...incredible turn of events.)

(I never expected the daughter of the Marquez family
was possessed and imprisoned in the basement of their
mansion.)

(As an aristocratic family, they purchased the drug in
large quantities to cover the traces of possession
and save face.)

(The security is unrivaled compared to any possessed
we've rescued until now. Not that I can even see into
the cell...from this position.)

(Usually, they let mercenaries who know nothing about
the situation handle the transport of the possessed.)
Say, why is this place so heavily guarded?
(Oh, good. Let's eavesdrop on this conversation.)

Even an aristocratic possessed is still just a
possessed, after all. Why not just throw her
into a testing facility?
...I'd suggest against idle curiosity.

Hahah! I tend to have too much time to think
on an easy mission like this.

I'm not sure why, but it appears the Templars are
attempting to take this possessed for themselves.

Huh?! Aren't the Templars that fanatic group who'd do
anything for the Holy Teachings? Why would they do
that?

I don't know more than that myself. They haven't
given me the details either, even though I'm in
charge of security.

What I know is that they'll defend this possessed to
the death from the Templars until the convoy is
ready...

And all I can say is everything has been settled with
the Marquez family regarding this.

*sigh* So that's it, huh? Well, good luck with the
next shift.

(...These guys are clueless about the gravity of the
situation because they haven't been given the
details.)

(Nicoletta Marquez, daughter of the Marquess Marquez,
is an extremely rare human possessed.)

(I'm not sure why, but the Cult considers this a
vital fact. That's why she's getting the VIP
treatment.)

(This also seems to be a special factor for the
Templars. That's why they're trying to snatch
the Marquess' daughter by force.)

(Human possession is vital to both the Cult and
Templars, so much so that it results in such
dark conflicts.)

(...Is that why a dark knight of the Cult once
kidnapped Lady Claire?)

(For starters, is it even possible to cure a
possessed human like you would an elf or
therianthrope?)

(I'm confident I could cure her if I put my mind to
it, but I'm not sure I could succeed in one shot with
a human...)

(Master Shadow certainly could've done it without
difficulty, just as he did with Claire!)

(...In any case, this isn't something I should go
ahead with on my own.)

...Jeez, I can't believe I'm heading back to
Alexandria already, like a dumb dog with its
tail between its legs.

Oh boy. I can just imagine the face of a certain
someone showing up to mock me.

But I can't afford to complain. All the Seven Shadows
of the Shadow Garden should be on this mission.

...I'm lucky I haven't lost my touch. We might be
able to save lives that otherwise would've been lost

Hmm... Sure, I can use the growth-promoting effects
of magic to produce cacao seeds in a year...

But growing cacao naturally takes another three
years, with no guarantee it will bear fruit...

You've done your best to recreate the environment
where cacao trees usually grow, so it should be fine.
Cultivation is a matter of perseverance.

Yes, that's right! I've even planted another tree to
provide shade for the cacao trees
Wait, Zeta?!
Gyaah!

Oh, I'm back. It's a little lame since I haven't been
gone that long.
Not at all! Welcome back, Zeta!
...Does that mean you've obtained vital intel?

Yep. I wouldn't have swallowed my pride and returned
like this if I didn't think I had something big.

From what I remember, everyone is here in Alexandria
today, right? If I missed today, there wouldn't be
another chance like this for a while.
Right, I'll gather all the Seven Shadows immediately!
...Start by wiping your bleeding nose.
Welcome back, Zeta.
Right...thanks.

Back already, pussy cat? Can't even run away from
home properly, huh? You really are pathetic!

Hmm. Well, you would know all about running
away from home, wouldn't you?
You! Don't you dare make fun of me!
Say, doggie, have you become a little more feral?

...Did my absence cause you to devolve
from a lack of using your brain?
What?! You pussy cat!

Hahah! Well then, let me stimulate that brain of
yours, doggie
Hrrraaaaah!!!

C'mon, we're here for an important meeting, so no
fighting, please!
So Zeta, what's this important intel?

And it's intel that requires all of us to act on...
correct?
I've discovered a human possessed.
...What?!
